name: scaid

body.origin:
|- wceq(csca, cslot(cfv(csca, cnx)))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ Scalar = Slot((Scalar ` ndx))
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csca, cslot(cfv(csca, cnx)))
-| wceq(csca, cslot(nat5))
-| wcel(nat5, cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Scalar = Slot((Scalar ` ndx))
⊣ Scalar = Slot(5)
⊣ 5 ∈ ℕ

comment: Utility theorem: index-independent form of scalar ~ df-sca . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
